ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: Ask a fletcher to make a rouge elm bow for you.  Mine is 13 dmg 50 delay 75 range and I bought it for 5 pp. Most fletchers seem to be in Greater Faydark Oh and
ygData.messageBody:
Ask a fletcher to make a rouge elm bow for you. Mine is 13 dmg 50
delay 75 range and I bought it for 5 pp. Most fletchers seem to be in Greater
Faydark

Oh and I talked to GM and he said that since paladins have the
archery skill they MIGHT be able to use tiny dagger and pine needles in the
next patch, but that we should all send Feedbacks to the GMs so that it gets
on the "list" of things to do. I have already done so and I urge the rest of
you to do it as well, whether you use a bow or not.

-Adaron
